education.title: Vellore Institute of Technology
education.description: Activities and Societies: Activities and Clubs - -Received Achiever Award by VIT -Vice-President at VIT Community Radio (90.8FM radio station ) -Pilot and PR Head of Team UAV ( UAV and Drone team of VIT) -Co ordinator at Indian Drone Racing League (IDRL - VIT) -Top 5 teams at Bolt Hackathon , Hackathon organized by ic-ETITE’20 (Madras Chapter) Core Committee member of Riviera, College annual fest -Core Committee Member at Photography Club VIT ( Exclusive Media Partner of Riviera , College Fest)

honors_and_awards.title: First Indian Drone Company Founder to Speak on TEDx
Shark Tank India Season 2 Winner
honors_and_awards.description: We got the interest for funding from four sharks out of 5 in Shark Tank India Season 2

honors_and_awards.title: Top 100 Emerging Startups by TIE Global
honors_and_awards.description: We have recognised as one the top 100 global startups out of 14000 applicants applied from all over the world.

honors_and_awards.title: Achiever Award
honors_and_awards.description: I was awarded the achievers award by VIT for my accomplishments in VIT and as well as at the national level.

honors_and_awards.title: Nominee for the India Top 500 Startup’s
honors_and_awards.description: insideFPV has successfully made it to the list of Top 500 Startup awards organized by Benchmark Trust.

honors_and_awards.title: Semi Finalists - The Ten Minutes Million
honors_and_awards.description: We paved our way in the ten minutes million as semi finalists. This challenge presents student startups and other early stage ventures the opportunity of raising seed fund (24 Lakh) after a ten minute pitch window to investors.

honors_and_awards.title: 1st rank in the photography competition
honors_and_awards.description: I secured the first rank in a state-level photography competition - Pixellence. The competition was part of the tech fest Momentum under Kshitij 2020 held by the SCET college in Gujarat from 15-16th October.

honors_and_awards.title: Runners Up - Bolt Hackathon
honors_and_awards.description: Developed an autonomous drone which can Monitor Soil health and condoling paste and weeds – Using computer vision and image analysis farmer can optimize pesticide usage by identifying paste affected crops and weeds and can be used for thermal imaging as well as for aerial seeding and spraying pesticide. Total of 120 Teams participated in the hackathon

honors_and_awards.title: Runners Up in Drone Racing Competition ( Flying buzz)
honors_and_awards.description: Drone racing competition conducted in Parul University , Baroda where pilots have to clear the track having multiple obstacle, each and every round had a different track and the last race was a NIGHT LOS RACE.

honors_and_awards.title: Winner of VIT Vellore Videography challenge(HYPERLAPSE CATEGORY)
Interschool sports competition
honors_and_awards.description: Winner of Multiple Sports Competition held in our School with 20+ certificates

honors_and_awards.title: Bronze Medalist - District Level Karate
honors_and_awards.description: Achieved Brown Belt in Karate in the year 2013 , competing multiple matches in the arena i got an oppurtunity to go for district level competition and i won bronze medal there , took me 2 and a half years of training to reach to brown belt.
